title: WTB: N172 Toad Ramsey and Scott Stratton
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Toad Ramsey and Scott Stratton
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I am a kentucky native so I have been looking for a N172 of Toad Ramsey and or Scott Stratton for a while now.  If anyone has either of them in any condition please let me know.  The lower the condition of the card the better as I am on a limited card budget.  Please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] or through the board.  Hope to here from someone and as always thanks for the help

Tony T
